cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked by a creature with lesser power, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a modified creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw up to that many cards. Do this only once each turn. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

cards.card_name: Cat and Dog, Nekomamushi and Inuarashi
cards.rules_text:
Cat & Dog can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Whenever Cat & Dog deal combat damage to a player, choose one—
• Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Cat & Dog.
• Draw a card.
cards.notes:
!tag: kouzuki-alliance
!tag: removal
!exportname Cat and Dog, Nekomamushi and Inuarashi

cards.rules_text:
Trample; Hexproof from instants
When Straw Hat Luffy enters, target opponent becomes the monarch.
Whenever Straw Hat Luffy attacks the monarch, double his power and toughness until end of turn.

Skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
Whenever Nami deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2 life. If you do, create two tapped Treasure tokens.

Triple strike [i](This creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if Zoro attacked this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on him.

Boast — {BG}: Mill two cards. For each of those cards, if its a land card, put a +1/+1 counter on Usopp. Otherwise, he deals 1 damage to target player or creature with flying. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]
Escape—{2}{B}{G}, Exile three cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, exile a card from your graveyard.
You may play cards exiled with Nico Robin.

Chopper enters with a +1/+1 counter on him.
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is Chopper's power.
{5}{G}: Monstrosity 4. [i](If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)[/i]

As long as Brook is a token, he isn't legendary.
Whenever a creature you control not named Brook dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Encore {1}{W}{B} [i]({1}{W}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever Franky becomes tapped, discard a card, then draw a card.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Haste; Melee [i](Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)[/i]
Whenever Sanji attacks, create a Food token.
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Sanji.

Jinbe crews Vehicles using his toughness rather than his power.
Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance.

First strike
Whenever Red Hair Shanks attacks, he deals 1 damage to each opponent.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, if it's your turn, after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
At the beginning of combat on each of your turns, untap all creatures you control.

Trample, indestructible
As long as there are six or more +1/+1 counters on Kaidou, he is a Dragon in addition to his other types and has flying.
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies or a blocking creature you don't control dies, put two +1/+1 counters on Kaidou.

When Whitebeard enters, destroy up to one target tapped creature. You become the monarch.
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 black Pirate creature token with lifelink.
As long as you are the monarch, other permanents you control have indestructible.

Menace
Whenever Marshal D. Teach deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an instant, sorcery or creature card from that players graveyard without paying its mana cost. If it is an instant or sorcery card, exile it as it resolves.

Ward—Exile the top eight cards of your library
Whenever you cast a spell, each player exiles the top two cards of their library and you draw a card.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

Menace
Other creatures you control have menace.
{5}: For opponent that was dealt damage this turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

Haste
Whenever another creature you control enters, it gains haste until end of turn and deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{5}: Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Vigilance
When Aokiji enters, put a stun counter on each creature you don't control.
{5}: Draw a card for each tapped nontoken creature you don't control.

Whenever a creature blocks Smoker, that creature loses all abilities until end of turns.
Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Smoker the White Hunter.

When Rob Luccy enters, other creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

Whenever a counter is put on Koby, untap him. He gains indestructible until end of turn.
Training [i](Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, Wapol gains that permanent's abilities in addition to his other abilities until end of turn.
{BG}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wapol. Activate only as a sorcery.

[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Sacrifice five artifacts: Eustass deals 5 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

Renown 1 [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)[/i]
Whenever Buggy attacks, for each opponent he isn't attacking, create a nonlegendary token copy of him except it has “At the end of your combat, if this creature hasn't dealt damage to an opponent this turn, sacrifice it.” It enters tapped and attacking that opponent.

Sir Crocodile gets +X/+X, where X is the number of land cards in all graveyards.
Whenever Sir Crocodile attacks, you may sacrifice a Basic land. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a Basic land. Each player that sacrificed a land this way creates a Desert land token with “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”

Other Merfolk you control get +2/+2.
{4}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Merfolk creature token with ward {2}. Activate only outside of combat.

Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Enel gains flying until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has triggered this turn, he deals 1 damage to each opponent. If this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, he deals 3 damage to any target.

Moria enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Moria.
Whenever Moria is dealt damage, prevent that damage, then remove that many +1/+1 counters from him.

Menace
Whenever Doflamingo attacks, for each opponent, gain control of target creature they control until end of turn. That creature becomes tapped and attacking an opponent of its owners choice.

Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

Flash
As Bon Clay enters, you may put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. If you do, he enters as a copy of that creature except it has the following ability and isn't legendary.
{3}{GU}: Exile Bon Clay, then return him to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Menace
If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent you don't control, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

Iceburg crews Vehicles as if his power was 2 greater.
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Opponents can't block creatures they own.
{3}{U}, {T}: Each player chooses another nonland, nontoken permanent that player controls and owns. Randomly redistribute control over the chosen permanents among all players.

Lifelink
Tap three untapped creatures you control: You become the monarch. Activate only once and only as a sorcery.
As long as you are the monarch, other creatures you control get +1/+1.
{3}{U}: If you control six or less creatures named Satellite, create a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token named Satellite with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”

When Dragon enters, target opponent becomes the monarch.
Whenever Dragon attacks, create two 1/1 red Rebel creature tokens with menace. If Dragon is attacking the monarch, those tokens enter tapped and attacking that player and gain indestructible until end of turn.

Destroy target creature. If a creature card is put into a graveyard this way, return it to the battlefield under your control. It gains decayed and becomes a Zombie in addition to its other types and abilities. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]

Choose one—
• Counter target spell.
• Counter all abilities.
Each opponent may discard up to two cards. For each player that discarded less than two cards this way, you lose life and draw cards equal to the difference.

Spree [i](Choose one or more additional costs.)[/i]
+ {3}{B} — Destroy all creatures.

Return target artifact, instant or sorcery card from from your graveyard to your hand.

When Laboon enters, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

Buster Call deals 4 to each opponent and each creature they control. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
